body.name: Elite Gourmet EDB-302BF# Countertop Double Cast Iron Burner, 1500 Watts Electric Hot Plate, Temperature Controls, Power Indicator Lights, Easy to Clean, Black

features: Easy to Clean: 6.5-inch and 5-inch Cast Iron flat cooking plates are nonstick and easy to clean with a damp cloth or non abrasive sponge
Adjustable Temperature: Quickly reach and sustain the desired LOW, MEDIUM or HIGH heat settings with the variable temperature knob to keep food warm or boil hot water.
Built in Safety: Dual power indicator lights on the front of the burner remind users when the item is powered ON; non skid feet ensure the burner remains stable during use.
Compact and portable: the compact size of the burner makes it an easily accessible item to take on the go wherever an extra cooking device is needed, at school, office, camping trips or home.
Efficient Power - With a combined wattage of 1500W, dual hot plates and individual temperature controls, delicious meals can be cooked simultaneously.
body.description: Cooking is quick, easy and consistent with the Elite Gourmet Electric Double Buffet Burner. This portable electric hot plate offers reliable heating and takes up minimal cooking space with one 6.5-inch and one 6-inch cast iron flat cooking plates. At 1,500 watts, it heats up quickly with dual adjustable temperature knobs offering Low, Med, and Hi settings. Power indicator lights offer added safety. The non-stick cast iron hot plates will ensure even cooking and make clean up a breeze. Use it when you need an extra heat source for holiday cooking and entertaining, or simply to keep food warm at a buffet station. The perfect addition to any cooks collection, it is compact enough to be stored in a cabinet, yet stylish enough to leave out for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power and Precision in a Compact Design
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the Elite Gourmet EDB-302BF# Countertop Double Cast Iron Burner, and it has proven to be a game-changer in my kitchen. This electric hot plate combines power, versatility, and ease of use in a sleek and compact design.Performance: 5/5The 1500 Watts of power packed into this double burner ensures rapid heating and precise temperature control. Whether I'm simmering sauces or searing meats, the burners deliver consistent and reliable performance. The cast iron construction helps distribute heat evenly, providing professional-level cooking results.Durability: 4/5The cast iron burners are robust and well-built, offering durability for long-term use. The housing is sturdy, but like any kitchen appliance, it benefits from gentle handling during setup and storage.Temperature Controls: 5/5The temperature controls are a standout feature. The adjustable knobs allow for precise temperature settings, giving me control over my cooking process. The power indicator lights are a handy visual cue, letting me know when the burners are active.Easy to Clean: 4/5Cleaning is a breeze thanks to the smooth, flat surface and removable drip trays. While the cast iron burners require a bit of attention, the overall design minimizes the effort needed to keep the hot plate in top condition.Compact Design: 5/5Perfect for kitchens with limited space, the compact design of this double burner makes it an ideal solution. It doesn't compromise on performance despite its size, making it suitable for both small apartments and larger kitchens.Versatility: 4/5From cooking family meals to hosting gatherings, the Elite Gourmet EDB-302BF# handles a variety of cooking tasks. The double burner setup allows for simultaneous cooking, adding efficiency to my meal preparation.In conclusion, the Elite Gourmet EDB-302BF# Countertop Double Cast Iron Burner has earned its place as a versatile and reliable kitchen companion. Whether you're a seasoned chef or a cooking enthusiast, this electric hot plate delivers the power and precision needed for a wide range of culinary adventures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal and Works as Promised
reviews.reviewText: My glass cooktop recently died and a new one of the right size is on backorder! So I needed a solution that could allow me to cook for my family for the next month without breaking the bank (I just paid for a new cooktop so I didn't want to spend too much). I have been pleasantly surprised by this little unit. For the price, it's awesome.What I love the most: price is great! It does work well - I have used it for just over a week and cooked dinner on it every night. I've boiled corn in a large pot without a problem, cooked up hamburger and chicken, made rice - just about everything. It definitely gets hot enough to boil and fry things. It's also easy to wipe down/clean.What I didn't love: The two burner pieces are close together and so you can for sure use two medium size pans at the same time, but you would struggle to use a large pan and another pan at the same time. Often I have to cook one thing, then the other - or I have to do smaller portions and use small/med size pans. Not a big deal, really.I noticed reviews spoke about the light going off. It's good to know it goes ON when it is heating and OFF once it reaches temp - so don't think the unit is turning off just because the light goes off. It just means it is at that set temperature.OVERALL: A fantastic solution for my problem and 100% worth the reasonable price. I plan to gift it to one of my adult children who lives in a small apartment once I am done - it's great for that situation, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product and great price!
reviews.reviewText: Our stove/oven died recently and I decided until we can buy a new one that a double burner hot plate just might suit our needs. I am so glad I bought this for my kitchen. The burners could be spaced further apart as others have mentioned but I am able to use my large skillet and a small pot/skillet at the same time. I have no problem boiling water and frying foods. The temperature setting gets plenty hot for me. I do a lot of from scratch cooking. I am a bit clumsy and uncoordinated so I have to be careful because it’s easy to knock your pot/pan off these burners. Also if the bottom of your pots/pans are warped in any way and not flat on the bottom you will have issues keeping them on these burners, in my opinion. So just be aware of that. This product is very easy to keep clean and is lightweight. Making it very easy to move.I place mine on a heat resistant mat while in use just for safety because the entire thing does get hot. Highly recommend you do the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Standard Portable Burner
reviews.reviewText: I personally used the portable burner for a hotpot and it worked just fine. It is very standard and gets the job done.Features: The burner part is a standard spiral, the knob goes from: OFF, 1-5, and MAX, and the there is the small light that indicates I’d the burner is off or on.Likes: It was cheaper compared to all the other ones and gets the job done with no issues.Dislike: Not much, only complaint I had was the cord is pretty short, so expect to use an extension cord if you plan to have it in the middle of the table.Overall would recommend if you need a cheap burner for smaller events or just to cook one thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just didn't fit my needs.
reviews.reviewText: There was nothing wrong with it, I was just seeing if it would work for a coffee warmer, just couldn't get enough heat. Fact is, for me...A thermos is the best way for scalding hot coffee. Makes a great coffee-pot heater, will keep it hot! I'm sure its a fine hot plate. Like I said, its my problem, not the items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but possible fire hazard 🔥
reviews.reviewText: This product works great! It heats up very quickly and gets HOT! The only issue is that the light indicator comes on when you turn it on but then shits off once it has reached the set temp. I wish it had a light that indicated the appliance was on/hot. I feel like the lack of this feature makes it a fire hazard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my life
reviews.reviewText: This electric stove saved my life while my home was under Reno. We had no stove and this was the perfect replacement for the time being. Comes with 2 burners that heats up pretty quickly. Fits 2 small/medium pots with ease. Cooks for throughly and evenly. I’m not usually an electric stove top fan but I was very satisfied with this product.
Muy buena en verdad, superó nuestras expectativas, mi esposa está encantada con ella.
Después de 4 días de haber publicado mi reseña con buenas referencias, dejó de funcionar, ya no calienta, solo enciende el foquito rojo, qué lástima!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product and a life saviour!
reviews.reviewText: This hot plate was a Godsend as my kitchen has been torn apart for almost a year. So, not having anything to cook on it was getting very expensive eating at restaurants every day. Then I thought maybe Amazon would have something I could buy to help me out and voilà this hot plate. It works fantastic. Also, having two burners I can cook two things at the same time. I find it really no different than a stove other than it is a bit slower to boil but not that much to complain. I just put a lid on the pot and it boils a little faster. Definitely a 5 star from this customer that’s for sure!!! *****

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived 17th Dec - stopped working on 11th Feb
reviews.reviewText: We have been using this item for 6 weeks when it just stopped heating up. The red light remains on so it is not the fuse that has blown. At the moment, I don't seem to be able to contact the seller for a replacement or a refund as this item is not fit for purpose. I will update if I am able to resolve this issue.
